entry.title: WIND WARNING , Okotoks
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:08 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. A mix of sun and cloud late this afternoon with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 in wind prone areas this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 4. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 06:06 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming clear late this evening and overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 06:06 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
